actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for defense economic adjustment assistance.
short_title: Economic Adjustment Assistance Authorization Act of 1991

summary.text: Economic Adjustment Assistance Authorization Act of 1991 - Amends the Defense Economic Adjustment, Diversification, Conversion, and Stabilization Act of 1990 to make permanent and remove the fiscal year dollar limitations on authorizations of appropriations for: (1) economic adjustment assistance to communities substantially and seriously affected by defense contract cancellations or cutbacks; and (2) defense conversion adjustment program grants.

titles.title: Economic Adjustment Assistance Authorization Act of 1991
A bill to authorize appropriations for defense economic adjustment assistance.
